<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Glamour](/Feats.aspx?ID=4050) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="All Ancestries" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=467" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 128</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Fey Influence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1239)

</column>

---

You unlock a new level of fey power and can manipulate the perceptions of others using a font of First World magic. You gain the [_fey glamour_](/Spells.aspx?ID=510) focus spell as a primal spell that doesn't have the [sorcerer](/Traits.aspx?ID=148) trait. If you don't already have a focus pool, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point.

**Special** This feat gains the trait appropriate for your ancestry ([human](/Traits.aspx?ID=90) for [human](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6), [goblin](/Traits.aspx?ID=81) for [goblin](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=4), etc.).
